sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect the following types of information:
list: Account information (name, email, username, profile picture)
Profile details (food preferences, dietary restrictions, allergies, location)
User-generated content (reviews, ratings, photos, videos, comments, likes)
Social connections (followers, following, friends, blocked users)
Restaurant visit history, favorites, and wishlists
Device information and location data when using our app
Communications with other users and restaurants
Payment information for reservations or purchases
Browser type and IP address
Usage patterns and interaction data
Food preferences and dietary restrictions
Reservation history and dining preferences
Social sharing and interaction history
Live streaming content and chat messages

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
list: Personalize restaurant and dish recommendations
Show relevant reviews, posts, and social content
Connect you with other food enthusiasts and friends
Notify you about restaurant updates, responses, and social interactions
Improve our food recommendation algorithms
Process reservations, orders, and payments
Ensure the authenticity of reviews and social content
Prevent fake reviews, spam, and abusive behavior
Analyze food trends and user preferences
Send promotional content and social notifications
Enable social features like following, sharing, and messaging
Facilitate food-related events and meetups
Support live streaming and real-time interactions
Generate personalized food content feeds

sections.title: 3. Social Features Privacy
list: Your profile visibility can be public, friends-only, or private
You can control who sees your food journey and reviews
Social connections and following lists can be hidden
You can block users and restrict interactions
Live stream privacy settings are customizable
Comments on your content can be moderated
You can control tags and mentions
Story/temporary content expires after 24 hours
Group chat and direct message privacy options
Social sharing preferences are adjustable

sections.title: 4. Review and Content Privacy
list: Reviews and photos you post are public by default
Your username and profile picture appear with your content
You can post reviews and photos anonymously
Restaurant owners can respond to your reviews
You can edit or delete your content anytime
We may feature your content on our platform
Other users can interact with your content
Content may be translated into other languages
You can disable comments on your posts
Review drafts are private until published
Photo location data can be hidden
Cross-posting privacy settings are available

sections.title: 5. Location and Check-in Data
list: Show nearby restaurants and food spots
Verify restaurant visits and check-ins
Provide directions to food locations
Improve local food recommendations
Customize search results based on location
Show relevant food promotions and events
Analyze dining trends in your area
Enable location-based social features
Facilitate food delivery services
Power location-based food discoveries
Enable friend nearby notifications
Support geo-tagged content

sections.title: 6. Information Sharing
sections.content: We share your information in these circumstances:
list: Public content is visible to all users
Restaurant owners can see reviews of their establishments
With advertising partners for targeted ads
With analytics providers to improve services
With social media platforms for content sharing
With third-party advertisers for personalized experiences
With your social connections based on privacy settings
For social features like tagging and mentions
With your consent for special features or promotions
To comply with legal obligations
To protect against fraudulent content or misuse
With service providers who assist our operations
For social media integration features
With third-party delivery services (with consent)
For event organization and meetups
In case of a merger or acquisition (with notice)

sections.title: 7. Advertising and Personalization
list: We use your data to show personalized ads and recommendations
Third-party advertisers may use cookies and similar technologies
You can adjust your ad preferences in settings
We may share anonymized data with advertisers
Advertisers may track your interactions with ads
Location data may be used for local advertising
Your food preferences influence ad content
Social interactions may affect ad targeting
You can opt-out of personalized advertising
We comply with digital advertising standards
Ad partners may have their own privacy policies
We protect sensitive data in advertising

sections.title: 8. Your Privacy Controls
sections.content: You can control your privacy through these options:
list: Choose content visibility (public/private/friends)
Manage your social connections and blocks
Control who can message or follow you
Set your profile visibility preferences
Manage location sharing settings
Edit or delete your content and history
Control email and push notifications
Manage third-party app connections
Control social media integration
Set default privacy for new posts
Manage comment permissions
Control live stream privacy

sections.title: 9. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your information as follows:
list: Account information: While your account is active
Public content: Until you delete it
Private messages: As specified in chat settings
Restaurant visit history: For personalization
Social connections: Until removed
Payment information: As required by law
Usage data: For analytical purposes
Blocked user lists: Until unblocked
Story content: 24 hours unless archived
Live stream recordings: As specified
Draft content: Until published or deleted

sections.title: 10. Security Measures
list: End-to-end encryption for private messages
Secure payment processing
Regular security audits
Two-factor authentication options
Secure data storage systems
Content moderation systems
Automated threat detection
Employee training on data protection
Access controls and authentication
Monitoring for suspicious activity
Regular backups and updates
Social engineering prevention

sections.title: 11. Children's Privacy
list: Users must be 13 or older to create an account
We do not knowingly collect data from children
Parents can request data deletion
Special protections for teen users (13-17)
Age verification processes
Restricted features for younger users
Parental consent requirements
Educational content about online safety
